doc:
Murray Valeriano https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Murray_Valeriano 0 Murray Valeriano is an American comedian, producer, writer and radio host. Valeriano has written for The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon, The Tonight Show with Jay Leno, Bill Engvall's Here's Your Sign Awards and Ridiculousness. He co-hosted the "Off the Cuff with Bill Engvall" radio show on Sirius/XM and currently hosts and produces the "Roadstories" podcast. Murray_Valeriano is an_American_comedian , producer_,_writer_and_radio_host . He co-hosted the_" Off the_Cuff with Bill_Engvall_"_radio_show on Sirius/XM and currently hosts and produces the_"_Roadstories_"_podcast .
